lead_paragraph: Center Patrick O’Bryant has a broken right foot. O’Bryant, the ninth selection in the June draft, was injured during an off-season scrimmage in Las Vegas last month. Team doctors diagnosed the injury in San Francisco this week. He will miss at least four weeks and will most likely be on the sideline when Golden State opens camp under its new coach, Don Nelson.
